hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Ghifar Al-Muthanna bin Sa'eed At-Ta'i:from Abu Tamimah al-Hujaimi from Jabir bin Sulaim who said: "I went to the Prophet (ï·º) and I said: ''Alaikas-Salam (upon you be peace)' so he replied: 'Do not say "'Alaikas-Salam" rather say As-Salamu Alaik.'" And he mentioned the story in its entirety
